contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox anthem |title = National Anthem of I.R.IRAN |title = سرود ملی جمهوری اسلامی ایران |transcription = Sorud-e Melli-ye Jomhuri-ye Eslāmi-ye Irān |english_title = National Anthem of the Islamic Republic of Iran |image = Flag of Iran.svg |image_size = |caption = The National Flag of Iran. |prefix = National |country = {{IRN}} |author = Multiple authors |lyrics_date = |composer = Hassan Riyahi |music_date = |adopted = 1990 |until = |sound = |sound_title = |sound = National Anthem of the Islamic Republic of Iran.ogg |sound_title = National Anthem of Iran }} {{Contains Perso-Arabic text}} '''The [[list of national anthems|national anthem]] of the [[Islamic Republic of Iran]]''' ({{lang-fa|'''سرود ملی جمهوری اسلامی ایران'''}} {{IPA-fa|ˈsoɾude melije dʒomhuɾije ʔeslɒmije ʔiɾɒn|}}) was composed by Hassan Riyahi, with words written collectively. This anthem was adopted in 1990, replacing [[Payandeh Bada Iran|the anthem used during the time of Ayatollah Khomeini]].<ref>{{cite web | url=http://nationalanthems.me/iran-national-anthem-of-the-islamic-republic-of-iran/ | title=Iran - National Anthem of Islamic Republic of Iran | publisher=NationalAnthems.me | accessdate=2011-11-28 }}</ref> == Lyrics == {| cellpadding="6" !Persian original ![[UniPers]] alphabet !English translation |- style="vertical-align:top" | style="direction:rtl;" | :سر زد از افق مهر خاوران :فروغ دیده‌ی حق باوران :بهمن، فرّ ایمان ماست :پیامت ای امام، استقلال، آزادی نقش جان ماست :شهیدان، پیچیده در گوش زمان فریادتان :پاینده مانی و جاودان :جمهوری اسلامی ایران | :Sar zad az ofoq mehre xåvarån :Foruqe dideye haqbåvarån :Bahman, farre imâne mâst :Payåmat ey Emåm, esteqlâl, âzâdi, naqše jâne måst :Šahidån, pičide dar guše zamân faryådetân :Påyande mâni o jåvedân :Jomhuriye Eslâmiye Irân | :Upwards on the horizon rises the Eastern Sun :The light in the eyes of the believers in justice :The Month of Bahman is the brilliance of [[Islam|our faith]]. :Your message, O [[Imam]], of independence, and freedom, is imprinted on our souls :O [[Military of Iran|Martyrs]]! Your clamours echo in the ears of time: :Enduring, continuing, and eternal, :The Islamic Republic of Iran |} ==Sheet music== [[File:National Anthem of the Islamic Republic of Iran(SHEET MUSIC).gif]]<ref>http://www.nationalanthems.info/ir.htm > http://www.nationalanthems.info/ir~.gif</ref> ==Sources== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://nationalanthems.me/iran-national-anthem-of-the-islamic-republic-of-iran/ National Anthem of Islamic Republic of Iran: Streaming audio, lyrics and information] * [http://www.national-anthems.net/IR Anthem on national-anthems.net] * [http://news.bbc.co.uk/olmedia/935000/audio/_935875_irannew.ram Instrumental version of "Sorud-e Melli-e Iran" in RealAudio] * [http://www.aviny.com/Voice/enghelab/Jomhori_eslami_iran.mp3 Islamic Republic of Iran National Anthem (mp3)] * [http://www.nationalanthems.info/ir.mid] {{National Anthem of Iran}} {{National symbols of Iran}} {{Nationalanthemsofasia}} [[Category:National anthems]] [[Category:Iranian songs]] [[Category:National symbols of Iran]]
